text: State Bank of India Park Town, as part of its CSR activity, donated 50 pieces of medical equipment. The equipment includes folding stretchers and was given to Rajiv Gandhi Government General Hospital, according to a release. They were handed over by the regional manager, SBI, region I, Chennai R. Tamilvaanan to the dean of MMC Dr. Vimala.
title: SBI donates medical devices to GH
